titleStmt.title: An act for confirming and establishing the administration of the goods and chattels of Sir William Godolphin, Knight, deceased
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Anno decimo Gulielmi III. Regis.
Signed at end: Matth. Johnson, Cler Parliamentor.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
